text: Daniel Palomar is an electrical engineer at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST), in Clear Water Bay, Hong Kong. He was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2013 for his contributions to convex optimization-based signal processing for communications. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Hong Kong University of Science and Technology faculty Category:Spanish engineers Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Daniel Palomar
